website_summaries.verdict: Small and affordably priced, making it worth considering for users who don't need a larger, sturdier whisk broom, but impractical for those who prefer a more rugged design.
pros: The approximate 6-inch sweep path is perfect for small areas and small spills
Ideal for use in the car
Broom fits precisely into the included dustpan for neat storage
cons: Feels flimsy, and isn't a good choice for cleaning up large spills or heavier debris

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of this and use it all of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this and use it all of the time. I remember the same design from over 20 years ago. Its cool and yellow is a great color. In any case, my only complaint is that it is hard to grab the broom part and remove it from the dust pan. It always requires much attention to do this. Needs a grab area, or thumb opening or something.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Can't imagine how I ever got along without this indispensable gadget! Perfect for neatly collecting crumbs, flour, cereal, whatever lands on my counter top or table while I'm preparing food. Way better than paper towels, which too often create more mess than they clean up. I keep this gadget handy, on a hook near my kitchen sink. Much quicker than any other cleanup device! This helps me prevent stuff from landing on the floor! Best of all, no paper towels to dispose of! Paper towels too often create more mess than they clean up! This thing captures spilled solids effortlessly!
customer_reviews.author: L. Morey

customer_reviews.title: great sweep for a litter pan
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quick small brush to pick up the little flakes outside the litter pan...this is perfect. I also got one for the kitchen counter so when I am trying to wipe up crumbs - I can sweep them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ann T. Ver RT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact set
customer_reviews.text: The flat edge of the dustpan actually lays very flat flush to the surface on which you are laying it, so you don't get that little line of dust and debris that can't quite get swept up.
customer_reviews.author: l_m_s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backpack camping.
customer_reviews.text: First off, it's wider than I expected and perfectly thin. The bristles are like the soft kitchen broom you have, but firmer, and the whole thing weighs like air. I just love the design! It practically locks in place and won't separate unless pulled apart or jolted super hard. Perfect to sweep the tent and fits super thin in your backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to sweep my beardie's sand back into her sandbox and collect loose greens. Works great! It nestles back into the pan easily and is lightweight enough to velcro to the side of her tank for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store, use, and keep car clean.
customer_reviews.text: Functional, light weight auto interior broom that tucks away nicely in front side door pocket for easy access and use. My only suggestion is for the manufacturer to make it easier to separate the broom from the pan. Not a big deal but an easy improvement to make.
customer_reviews.author: JCO

customer_reviews.title: It comes apart as fits back together easily. We use it most with baking projects when ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 3-6 year old classroom environment. The children (and adults) are able to use it to clean up all sorts of table crumbs. It comes apart as fits back together easily. We use it most with baking projects when they are leveling sugar and flour. They are able to sweep even these fine particles into the pan easily. Thank you for this affordable and well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Small messes beware! Great mini tool
customer_reviews.text: This is kept on a magnetic hook in the kitchen. It really works great to quickly clean up dry messes on the kitchen counter top. Since it has a slim profile it fits neatly on the hook between the space between the counter and fridge. Very happy with purchase and quality of item.
customer_reviews.author: BleuSquiid

customer_reviews.title: HANDY MINI BROOM !!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is so handy in my car - easy to store and easy to pull out to clear out all those little bits of hair and food that get crammed into the crevices of my seats. I also keep another on my computer desk to take care of the same detritus around my keyboard. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Calamity Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car!
customer_reviews.text: A great little dust brush and pan to keep in the car. I find that dust brushes clean the seats of cars better than wipes (especially for those of us with kids who eat in the car). This one is nice and compact and fits easily into the glove box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Megow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, perfect smaller than average size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for. Smaller than a regular dust pan and whisk broom for my daughter to sweep up after her mice. The whisk broom fits nicely in the dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Julesss

customer_reviews.title: So cute and very useful. I keep this in my diaper bag to ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute and very useful. I keep this in my diaper bag to quickly sweep up after my little guy when eating at a friends house or restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: You can’t get the broom detached from the dust pan without getting your hands all over the broom.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle the Turtle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for tiny kitchen/ dorm messes
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean up coffee grounds/toaster mess around the kitchen and it works perfectly. Its quick and easy to store and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Small and tidy
customer_reviews.text: It nice and small. Perhaps a little too small for my uses. I wanted a small dust broom/pan to clean off science lab benches in my classroom after the kids were done, it is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: stephen j harris

customer_reviews.title: i like how deep the pan is for the size
customer_reviews.text: cute, but really small. about the size of two iphones... i like how deep the pan is for the size, keeps the dust in! Good for small spaces, but not a primary broom!
customer_reviews.author: LS_in_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact and works to sweep things up
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact and works to sweep things up. Did come with a few of the Brussels bent on one of the edges which leads me to believe that this will not hold up forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Filip

customer_reviews.title: This is quite a useful thing for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a useful thing for small jobs, maybe table or countertop use, where you might want something you can keep around food and never get real dirty. I like this a lot. Slightly difficult to detach the broom from tray.
customer_reviews.author: wboz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Small enough and strong enough to clean around the cat litter bin in our tiny bathroom we must share with the cat! Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: C. miller

customer_reviews.title: Dust pan
customer_reviews.text: It’s used in my classroom. The kids like it because it’s a little different than a typical broom and dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Macs

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size from daily cleanup. I live that the broom and dust pan fit neatly together
customer_reviews.author: Momma Pap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We are doing baby led weaning and everywhere we go to eat gets very messy so we wanted a small dustpan to sweep up after our selves. This fits in the diaper bag and every few days I wash it in the dishwasher. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: samantha Gaw

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually larger than I anticipated. I was looking for a small compact wisk and pan to use for motorcycle camping. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: JCStark5

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. Larger than I expected which is fine. Keeping it in the living room for little messes and I ended up needing it about an hour after I got it. Very handy and nice looking but low profile so it can be sorta hidden in plain sight.
customer_reviews.author: kassit

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to store and hasn’t frayed out yet. My only complaint is that the brush just lays inside pan. I wish it held it in.
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: So simple and cute. It cleans up very well and is very durable. The bristles do not bend or get unruly over time. It's small, so I use it for tables and messes around the kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great little broom! I just use it to sweep up my cats litter from around her box. Works great for a small space!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really love it. Great size, bristles fairly flexible. Use it to clean of surfaces easily whether it's the kitchen counter, the floor or the sawdust on my husbands work table.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: This dust pan set is very handy for cleaning shelves in my chinchilla cage and around the table the cage stands on. It’s very compact and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small area
customer_reviews.text: Keep this in my truck to sweep out its rubber floors. Works great, no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: This thing is small and necessary! I didn’t even realize how handy it would be but I find myself using it ALL THE TIME. Perfect for clean freaks like myself.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: Can be annoying. Tough to get brush out of holder
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is well designed and (drum roll) it works! It will go camping with me for the inside of tents. Keep it clean!
customer_reviews.author: BikeMike

customer_reviews.title: For very light use only
customer_reviews.text: The pan is a little warped (so it doesn't sit flat against the surface you place it against) and the brush doesn't sweep up any heavy little objects very well (like pebbles or kitty litter). I would say this would work far better to sweep up something like sawdust on a workbench.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Mini dust pan with brush
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy to use when you want to clean up crumbs from a counter top or any surface. I constantly use it around the kitchen. It takes up no space to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Vrexrider

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in our diaper bag to clean up after our twin toddlers when we're out and about. It's super slim so it's easy to carry with us without taking up a lot of room. It's great for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C. Bondur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keeping my truck to broom off the carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this little mini broom and dust pan. it works quite well at sweeping up crumbs and dust
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Gibson-Zeigler III

customer_reviews.title: Does small jobs well and takes up no room, hangs flush to the wall.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute but also VERY small. Today I broke a glass and used it for the first time and it did the job well. I love that it's flat and hangs flush to the wall, taking up no space at all. Good for small jobs. The color and design are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kate KenworthyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Real nice, Brussels have a little more give than I'd like but still it is only a small piece for small messes. Great for picking up after a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Roadmaster82505

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is a worthless piece of junk, just light $6 on fire instead.
customer_reviews.author: grimace

customer_reviews.title: Convenient travel dustpan
customer_reviews.text: We use this when we take our cat on trips with us. It's perfect for sweeping up any stray litter that tracks outside of her box.
customer_reviews.author: Tanalai

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Cute and compact. I like how the broom fits nicely into the dustpan perfectly and the hole for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Neen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only for minimal use on my work office floor. Works well enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Song

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to take camping
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to take camping. It is very thin, but I guess that is what keeps it small and light. Does the job cleaning the tent
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So so cute! The bristles are very plastic-y, and arrived with just a few sticking out. Otherwise, it fits together perfectly, which makes for easy storage, and the colors are so fun and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Harlie Delay

customer_reviews.title: Cute little duster I use to sweep my kitchen counters ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little duster I use to sweep my kitchen counters. The only drawback it that the boom part can be difficult to remove from the dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not big & bulky, perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Very small, but does the job for small piles ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small, but does the job for small piles and things. I use it for cat litter in my bathroom. Would not use to clean the whole house! Only small areas
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It is handy for stray cat litter
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Doesn't stay in place when "clipped" on to the dust pan but it works great for getting cat litter that gets out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love this for cleaning out my tent when camping
customer_reviews.text: Love this for cleaning out my tent when camping! It's petite and well made, easy to throw into my stuff sack with my tent gear.
customer_reviews.author: MoonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Slim clean design
customer_reviews.text: Great for storage and does its job cleaning my sink.
customer_reviews.author: eva hsu

customer_reviews.title: Super small. Like for a child
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. Umm.. Super small. Like for a child. But it works still.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: TINY but effective
customer_reviews.text: This works welll for tiny messes, but might be too small for most uses.
customer_reviews.author: M'ette

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice portable dustpan to keep handy and easily fits into ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler makes a mess at restaurants. This is a nice portable dustpan to keep handy and easily fits into a purse or diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little dustpan!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little dustpan for sweeping up after my toddlers eat. Plus I like that it’s kinda of a retro design.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kitchen spills
customer_reviews.text: It’s itty bitty, the perfect size for storing in a drawer or cabinet for small kitchen spills.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Super little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the car and it fits in the glove compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute little whisk broom for cleaning keyboards and other small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Will update in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Great for the car for those hard to reach places!
customer_reviews.author: V. Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice little broom, fits in between trash and sink or fridge and cabinet. The hold between the brush and pan is a little flimsy though and there doesn’t seem to be an easy way to get the brush out of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: aj

product_meta.title: Home-X Mini Broom and Dustpan Set
product_meta.description: When the spill is too small for the broom or vacuum, sweep it up fast with this mini combo. Puts a sturdy hand broom and dustpan at your fingertips so you can quickly tend to the spilled cereal, coffee grinds and cookie crumbs. They nest together for compact storage and have holes for hanging on the cabinet or closet door. In bright yellow plastic with orange bristles in durable rinse-clean polypropylene. About 6"L x 5¾"H overall.
